title: RP bug
body: Hello, i buy yesterday RP for 100kƒç-520RP and i dont take it, why? thanks for help...

replies.body: Were you charged for the RP? If so, the transaction went through, so you'll want to reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can see what happened.
